title: [Health] Study N=191 suggests that adhering to a Mediterranean diet may alleviate or prevent PTSD symptoms. In particular red and processed meats was positively associated with PTSD symptoms, while plant-based foods was negatively associated with PTSD symptoms

[Medicine] SARS-CoV-2 infection correlates with male benign prostatic hyperplasia deterioration, and is associated with increased incidence of urinary retention, haematuria and urinary tract infections (UTI) in men
